text: le) Abnormality of dental enamel 90% Anonychia 90% Brachydactyly syndrome 90% Carious teeth 90% Corneal dystrophy 90% Palmoplantar keratoderma 90% Photophobia 90% Short stature 90% Abnormality of the fingernails 50% Abnormality of the metacarpal bones 50% Gingivitis 50% Premature birth 50% Hearing impairment 7.5% Nyctalopia 7.5% Abnormality of the teeth - Autosomal dominant inheritance - Erythroderma - Onycholysis - Palmoplantar hyperkeratosis - Short distal phalanx of finger - The Human Phenoty
